verses.roman:
evaṁ kriyā-yoga-pathaiḥ
pumān vaidika-tāntrikaiḥ
arcann ubhayataḥ siddhiṁ
matto vindaty abhīpsitām

synonyms: evam—in this way; kriyā-yoga—of regulated Deity worship; pathaiḥ—by the processes; pumān—a person; vaidika-tāntrikaiḥ—presented in the Vedas and tantras; arcan—worshiping; ubhayataḥ—in both this life and the next; siddhim—perfection; mattaḥ—from Me; vindati—he achieves; abhīpsitām—desired.
translation: By worshiping Me through the various methods prescribed in the Vedas and tantras, one will gain from Me his desired perfection in both this life and the next.
